TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to update a Person StatusCode in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates Person with StatusCode. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the StatusCode of the Person. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the Person message schema area (for instance the 'Ground Picture > Intelligence Assessment' topic). Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Person with updated StatusCode information is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a Person with the following StatusCode information: HostilityStatusCode=Friend DutyStatusCode=AtDuty MilitaryStatusCode=Military PhysicalStatusCode=Fit
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Person and the StatusCode information correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates StatusCode of the Person with the following StatusCode information: HostilityStatusCode=Joker DutyStatusCode=Hospitalised MilitaryStatusCode=Paramilitary PhysicalStatusCode=SlightlyIncapacitated PersonPhysicalStatusQualifierCode=Injured
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Person and the updated StatusCode information correctly.
